SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ButtonBuilder
The `ButtonBuilder` class is a utility for creating customized `JButton` instances.
DatabaseManager
DatabaseManager class handles the database connection and operations for the Keysmash application.
EndScreen
The EndScreen class represents the end screen of the typing test game.
ExplosionLabel
The ExplosionLabel class extends JLabel to create a label with an explosion animation effect.
GameScreen
The GameScreen class represents the main game screen where the typing game is played.
HelpScreen
HelpScreen class provides a user interface panel that displays game instructions and information to the user, including the objective of the game and how to navigate back to the main menu.
LeaderboardScreen
The LeaderboardScreen class represents the GUI screen that displays the leaderboard.
Main
The entry point of the Keysmash application.
MainWindow
The MainWindow class represents the main window of the Typing Test application.
PregameScreen
